properties.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Southeast Johnson County; Bighorn Mountains West; Northeast Johnson County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 9 at 1:37PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Periods of snow. Accumulations of 1 to 3 inches across
Johnson County, with the higher amounts occurring along
Interstate 90 and the Buffalo area; 3 to 5 inches in the
Bighorn Mountains.

* WHERE...Johnson County and the Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...This evening through the overnight hours tonight.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow could cause rapid
decreases in visibility, as well as slick and snow covered
roads.

NWSheadline: Snow Developing over Johnson County Tonight
